Package edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.microwave

Provides a microwave oven demo (run this demo).

Interface Summary
EventLabels Event labels for the microwave demo.
 

Class Summary
ControlPanel The control panel consists of buttons for setting the time, for starting and stopping the device, for setting timer-only mode, and for changing the power setting.
